promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic special boar normal-type wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in grassland-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Braceroar, a gigantic special boar normal-type pokemon. It can be found in grassland-like environments It has the following abilities: defense-curl. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word boar or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, boar-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: Braceroar is a massive Pokémon living in grassy areas. It curls up daily to protect itself, then feeds on flowers and grass.
